product_name: REI Airflyte Hybrid Jacket - Women's Plus Sizes
long_description: Ready for a run, but reluctant to face the cold? The women's plus-size REI Airflyte Hybrid jacket limits your excuses with warm insulation and stretchy sleeves and side panels for easy movement. Wind- and water-resistant recycled ripstop polyester houses lightweight synthetic insulation to warm your core in front and back; insulation continues to warm even when wet. Insulated section features a Durable Water Repellent finish to resist light moisture. Sleeves and side panels of jacket feature a stretchy polyester/spandex fabric that wicks moisture, dries quickly, moves with you and offers high breathability. Jacket offers UPF 50+ protection from UV light. Full-length zipper offers instant ventilation, and draft flap helps guard core heat. Zippered pockets shelter hands and feature a cord port for your earphones. Thumbholes allow sleeves to extend over top of hands for warmth. Raglan sleeves and ergonomic flat seams help reduce chafing and complement your natural movements. Reflective rear fabric loop and front logo enhance visibility in dim light. The women's REI Airflyte Hybrid jacket has an active fit that moves with you and stays close to your body.
short_description: Ready for a run, but reluctant to face the cold? The women's plus-size REI Airflyte Hybrid jacket limits your excuses with warm insulation and stretchy sleeves and side panels for easy movement.
